entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 40%
